mapper.insert: INSERT INTO test_subscriber_result(test_id, message_id, subscription_type, subscription_id, subscription_publish_time, subscription_arrival_time, subscriber_arrival_time, pull_options, created_at) VALUES(#{testId}, #{messageId}, #{subscriptionType}, #{subscriptionId}, #{subscriptionPublishTime}, #{subscriptionArrivalTime}, #{subscriberArrivalTime}, #{pullOptions}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE test_result SET topic_arrival_time = #{topicArrivalTime}, topic_publish_time = #{topicPublishTime} WHERE test_id = #{testId} AND message_id = #{messageId} AND (topic_arrival_time IS NULL OR topic_publish_time IS NULL)
